TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebPartTransformer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供轉換程式類別的基本實作，以便在兩個不相容連接點之間轉換資料。

span.span: Provides basic implementation for transformer classes to convert data between two incompatible connection points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換程式用來轉譯具有不相容的連接點的兩個 Web 組件控制項之間的資料。Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points. 在提供或取用資料，透過不同的介面時，連接點不相容。Connection points are incompatible when they provide or consume data through different interfaces. 例如，提供者實作的型別提供者連接點無法直接連接到接收的型別提供者連接點的取用者。For example, a provider implementing a provider connection point of type could not directly connect to a consumer expecting a provider connection point of type . 相反地，必須使用轉換程式，來連接兩個 Web 組件控制項。Instead, a transformer must be used to connect the two Web Parts controls. 轉換程式會接受資料提供者連接點所支援的型別。The transformer accepts data of the type supported by the provider connection point. 它會將該資料轉換為支援消費者連接點的類型所需的內部處理。It does the necessary internal processing to convert that data into the type supported by the consumer connection point. 轉換程式可以提供使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者設定在連接模式中的轉換程式。A transformer can provide a user interface (UI) that allows the user to configure the transformer when in the connect mode. 組態控制透過擷取方法，並在 Web 組件連接區域顯示。The configuration control is retrieved through the method and is displayed in a Web Parts connections zone. 是抽象類別，而且必須以提供不同類型的連接點之間的自訂的轉譯延伸。 is an abstract class and must be extended to provide customized translations between different types of connection points. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立衍生自的自訂的轉換器類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a customized transformer that derives from the class. 轉換程式，名為`RowToStringTransformer`，可讓 Web 組件提供者和 Web 組件之取用者不相容的連接點的連線。The transformer, named `RowToStringTransformer`, allows for a Web Parts provider and Web Parts consumer with incompatible connection points to be connected. 提供者會將資料呈現的型別，取用者可接受的資料類型，但。The provider presents data of type , but the consumer accepts only data of type . `RowToStringTransformer`類別會執行必要的轉換。The `RowToStringTransformer` class performs the necessary conversion. 程式碼範例不包含提供者或取用者的實作。The code example does not include an implementation of the provider or consumer. 您必須建立實作的提供者介面，並預期透過自訂介面，名為資料的取用者`IString`，範例才能運作。You must create a provider that implements the interface and a consumer that expects data through a customized interface named `IString` for the example to work. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/TransformerSource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/TransformerSource.vb#5)] 程式碼範例的第一個區段包含提供者和消費者 Web 組件的控制項，並轉換程式的程式碼的程式碼。The first section of the code example contains code for the provider and consumer Web Parts controls, and the code for the transformer. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/TransformerSource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/TransformerSource.vb#4)] 第二個區段的程式碼範例示範如何轉換程式內的宣告式語法物件。The second section of the code example shows how to include the transformer within the declarative syntax for a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/Transformer.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/Transformer.aspx#1)] 必須在指定的自訂的轉換器``變成可供在網頁中使用 Web.config 檔案區段。A customized transformer must be specified in the `` section of the Web.config file to be available for use in a Web page. 第三個區段的程式碼範例示範如何將自訂的轉換程式加入至 Web.config 檔案。The third section of the code example shows how to add the customized transformer to the Web.config file. ```vb ``` ```csharp ``` 程式碼範例包含使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。The code example includes a user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 您可以取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)，而且它必須放置在.aspx 頁面與相同的資料夾。You can obtain the .ascx file for the user control from [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0), and it must be placed in the same folder as the .aspx page.

summary.span: 顯示在 區域中設定轉換程式的 ASP.NET 控制項。

span.span: Displays an ASP.NET control that configures a transformer in the zone.

returns.span: 設定轉換程式的 ASP.NET 控制項。

span.span: An ASP.NET control that configures a transformer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換程式需要使用者進行設定，會顯示組態控制。A configuration control can be displayed when a transformer requires a user to configure it. 組態控制會提供使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者選取的值都會被轉換。The configuration control provides a user interface (UI) that allows the user to select which values will be transformed. 連接區域中呈現。It is rendered in a connections zone. 組態控制項必須實作介面。The configuration control must implement the interface.

param.span: 物件，包含使用 所儲存的組態狀態。

span.span: An object containing configuration state saved by using .

summary.span: 載入以 方法所儲存的組態狀態。

span.span: Loads the configuration state saved with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，將用來設定轉換程式的 ASP.NET 控制項載入儲存的組態狀態。Use this method to load the saved configuration state into the ASP.NET control used to configure a transformer.

summary.span: 儲存使用者在 ASP.NET 組態控制項中所設定的組態狀態。

span.span: Saves the configuration state set by the user in the ASP.NET configuration control.
An object representing the configuration state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來儲存設定的組態資料中用來設定轉換程式的 ASP.NET 控制項。Use this method to save the configuration data set in the ASP.NET control used to configure a transformer.

span.span: The provider data to be transformed.

summary.span: 實作時，提供物件以轉換資料。

span.span: When implemented, provides an object for transforming the data.
An representing the data to be transformed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作時，您必須覆寫這個方法類別。You must override this method when implementing the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a customized class. 它是在中找到之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。It is part of a larger example found in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/TransformerSource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/TransformerSource.vb#3)]
